system.availability: Master-Crafted Relic Servo-Skull of the Deathwatch. Uses Regular Servo Skull template but with WS 30, T 30, and +20 Awareness, Concealment, and Silent Move. Is equipped with an Auspex and Astartes Signum.
system.cost:
Servo Skull built from a Space Marine.
Weight only applies if being carried.
